cyclone.name: BERYL
cyclone.current_location: about 1295 mi ESE of the Lesser Antilles
cyclone.trajectory: Fast west-to-west-northwest motion toward the Lesser Antilles; forecast to remain south of Puerto Rico and possibly dissipate near or just east of the islands late Sunday

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Windward and Leeward Islands from Barbados northward to Guadeloupe
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds are not expected at San Juan; probability <1%
weather_observation.rainfall: Isolated bands of showers possible early next week; heavy accumulations unlikely
